name: Studies in Idiocy
commands: How can I be expected to get any research done in this shanty...|If I had never beaten that idiot at poker, I would still be safe and sound at the library...
Hey, new girl!|What're you doing, all cooped up in here by yourself?|You should come out and hang with us!|Just between me and you, but I think Segundo has a crush on you...
Thanks, but I'd rather stay in here, by myself.{w} I have important research to attend to.{w} As for the second matter, you can tell him I am not interested.
Ha, I don't blame you!|I love him, but I don't think the kid's ever heard of a bathtub.|Anyways, what are you researching?{w} Can I see?|I've always wanted to know what you smart people get up to.
Well, it's complicated.|I've been studying the ostracization of shamans,{w} and their relationship with the Church of Sarenas.
The ostrichation of who with the what now?
I told you, it was a complex issue.|It took me years of studying at the academy to understand this topic.
Hey, I'm not a dummy!|Why don't you just try to explain it with normal words?

Fine.|Hundreds of years ago, there were many people who manifested strange powers.|As time went on, these people were shunned by society,{w} and their powers eventually disapeared.|I believe the Church had a large part to play in this disappearance.
Huh.{w} Why'd everyone hate those weirdos?|Donny and Vern do weird stuff too, but they're still my best friends.
That is what I seek to find out, Marcela.
Well, have fun with that, then, Clauds.{w} I've gotta get back in the action.|Don bet me 5 marks that I couldn't convince Segundo to steal Maria's books.
